title: How's G Pulla Reddy College for CSE? - Quora
tags: G Pulla Reddy Engineering College, Kurnool

response.answer_text: The college is very good for CSE moreover you will also find great lecturers like Imtyaz sir, Chakradhar who are good at latest technologies and their guidance also help you to get adapted to competitive programming as well as data structures and algorithms Apart from that you should learn programming and data structures on your own and should be a pro in at least one of these technologies 1.AI/ML 2.Data analytics 3.cloud 4.visual computing CSE curriculum which is implemented in our college was almost Same as the one implemented at NIT's and IIIT's and is going to be revised this year for giving more feasibility to the students in fourth year for doing internships, projects or any other things The only drawback in our college in CSE is less exposure to the real world projects and lack of imparting real world project knowledge. It Should improve in these aspects and should be strict and also ensure that students do a single project at least in each year of btech ( at least 5 projects in entire btech)

It is good. It has got fully qualified professors, some of them have onsite working experience. The curriculum is as per the current trend and industry requitement. It has got well built labs and systems installed with necessary softwares. The matters of concern are :- 1.) Fee which touches nearly a lakh per annum 2.) The intake strength is 180 plus. But is all depends on the student to extract the maximum out of the professors and the college infrastructure and to get the value out of every penny you pay. CSE in Pulla Reddy - Definitely worth every penny
